name: Zenith 260 VertiLift Elevating Hylo Adjusting Table
descr:
260-Zenith VertiLift Elevating Hylo Adjusting Table

This deluxe ELEVATING/HYLO table incorporates both TERMINAL POINT cervical and pelvic drops to provide value with versatility for a wide range of techniques. 

Features:

5 Year Limited Parts Warranty 
Tilt Headpiece 
Universal Headraiser raises or tilts for ideal set-up 
Forward Motion Headpiece w/ lo-force drop mechanism 
Face Paper Toweling and Dispenser 
Soft Hinged Dorsal 
Swingaway Abdominal- Adjustable Tension 
Slide & Crank Pelvic 
Terminal Point Pelvic Drop w/ lo-force drop mechanism 
Adjustable Front Section 
Adjustable Ankle Rest Cushion 
Tuckaway Foot Board w/ Auto Relaxer 
Dual footswitches for easy access up, down, and stop 
Front mounted up, down, and stop switches 
Heritage Upholstery in a variety of colors 
Base colors available in many coordinating colors 
Table Length 78” 
Table Height varies from 24” - 30" 
Table Width 24” 
Cushion Width 18” 
Table Weight 520 lbs. depending on options
